name: WOUNDS 4 Hard Medication
description:
Despues de una gran explosion que destrozo y quemo la pesadilla de una joven,Alma termino ingresada en el mismo Hospital donde fue conzevida,desmasiado destrozada para salir de alli,pero es lo unico que le queda,

//////////////////////

After a great explosion that destroyed and burned the nightmare of a young woman, Alma ended up admitted to the same Hospital where she was found, too devastated to leave there, but it is the only thing she has left.
